Reviews.Title: “A question of balance”
Reviews.Author: Mic M
Reviews.Content: wife recently stayed nights hotel booked reading tripadvisor reviews trepidation seeing negative comments re size neednt worried yes means fit purpose clean functional found couldnt location 5 minutes heavy paddington station close hyde park 5 minute stroll top town ie marble arch easily outweighs minor glitch price considered paid night double third floor seen similar nearby staff unfailingly friendly helpful approachable trouble genuine smile grace balance cost location size winner book

Reviews.Title: “Not what it appears.....”
Reviews.Author: BEA1955
Reviews.Content: husband stayed 3rd week 2011 hotel nice outside lobby beautifulwe picky travelers clean staff wellthe cramped typical style faced court yard contained garbage cans smoking staffthe air conditioning extremely hot night sleep window 3 nights woke 3am screaming fighting coming window shaft politely 2nd night screaming please called desk itthe 3rd night drunken screaming complaint desk morning move told offending party checking dayso management annoying left own hotel looks worn desk internet mediocre wifi staff nice goodness dont forget key roomyou crown jewels borrow key bathroom bed worn dirtythe breakfast exact breakfast morningthe local neighborhood nice near lots restaurants pubs paddington station block bus route walking hype park buckingham palace personally recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “a short stay at the hotel”
Reviews.Author: miamiAthens
Reviews.Content: bedsa tall feel bed near window cold air outside enter spaces window night central heating staff politethe location hotel near paddington underground station

Reviews.Title: “Excellent for central London”
Reviews.Author: Nick0demus
Reviews.Content: visited hotel earlier week 2 night stay delighted hotel double bed tiny shower teacoffee facilities hair drier tv complimentary breakfast expected buffet offered scrambled eggs sausages baked beans toast marmalade excellent coffee able park car directly outside front entrance gated secure daily fee £15 nearby tube station lancaster gate allowed easy access west recommend hotel gladly stay

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic”
Reviews.Author: WalesViv
Reviews.Content: stayed nights spotlessly clean staff manager friendly water shower getting floor bathroom couple towels soon trick breakfast fine scrambled egg sausage beans toast cheese ham jams staff bring tea coffee table definately stay reccommend corner paddington train underground station hyde park five minute walk

Reviews.Title: “Location,clean and friendly”
Reviews.Author: lowe_d8
Reviews.Content: triple roomit served cleanroom serviced everydaywe stayed 4 nights found suitable lower attentive price paid 4 nights triple valuei wouldnt expected breakfast included price especially london obviously day sleeping sit apart corner hotel plenty eating paddington underground main stones lovely beautiful buildings hotels trees lining easy stops ideal stay sight seeing read lots reviews hotel minds mixed reviews werent disappointed dont believe read standards couldnt fault cleanliness polite staff stay

Reviews.Title: “Average price; good location.”
Reviews.Author: AbuDhabiHolly
Reviews.Content: location minutes paddington main line station hyde park average hotel sign wear tear bathrooms tiny breakfast dire tasteless beans scrambled eggs price couldnt beat fastfood restaurants walking distance fare walk internet goes sleep 10 pm weve stayed stay luxury hilton £100

Reviews.Title: “Don't be fooled, not a three star hotel!”

Reviews.Content: staff friendly helpful central location pub arms round corner bad despite foyer stylish welcoming goes hill decor dated shabby stayed struggled store suitcases move double single wardrobe 14 tv 5 channels £10 deposit remote control queue share table breakfast breakfast cheapest nastiest hotel stayed days breakfast decided

Reviews.Title: “Handy to Paddington Station”

Reviews.Content: value money im lot choose booked hotel close paddington station hyde park restaurants shopping including laundromat nearby free wifi unfortunately available reception access breakfast included rate found staff friendly helpful

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Location for Tourism”

Reviews.Content: staff beautiful decor sized bathroom decent breakfast stayed 4 nights adequate spent day beds comfortable bedding clean bathroom sized shower stall surprisingly hotel elevator luxury expensive hotels europe staff friendly helpful breakfast continental english touches sausage beans eggs floor street noisy night pub directly below closing window solved id definitely stay perfectly located tourists short walk paddington station subway system trains directly heathrow windsor pretty tranquil restaurants nearby banks etc
